reviews.sentence: Conveniently located. The hotel was conveniently located by Chatswod station and the wonderful The District for delicious hawker style food. Reception and booking staff where very helpful and parking whilst 25 was a breeze. The kids loved the pool spa. Give the breakfast a miss as this was a real let down spring sausage rolls and cold eggs. The room was spacious but needed maintenance tv not working door handle coming off and tepid water in the shower. The kids room next door was in much better condition. Would stay again but not at the price we paid.

Pool and spa worked at treat. Unlike many hotels that say they have a heated pool and spa but it is ineffectual Mantra Chatswod was in working order. Beautiful relaxation. Well ordered and well positioned Shopping galore and food galore Breakfast was a bit bland.

Well placed for travel to city restaurants shops. Excellent all round hotel with reasonable rates. Friendly helpful staff. Gym and pool open 247 As above Close to train station without being noisy. Lots of bars and restaurants nearby walking distance. Malls and shops within 5 minutes walk. Nothing.

Comfortable Apartment for couple. Very clean. The kitchenette bedroom and lounge area are pleasant and welcoming. Great pillows nice bed and a very comfortable lounge. Plenty of storage. Chairs for table are uncomfortable if using for any length of time. European laundry in the large bathroom. Secure parking fairly priced much better than other local options. Good buffet breakfast although the bacon was always overcooked and oily. We had a front room on the sixth floor booked for four days over Christmas. There is street noise which was not surprising given the area and season. Minimal noise from adjoining apartments. The bathroom is odd. It is very large and has a wide vanity bench with overhung basin large mirror shelf with good lighting for make up. Bath sheets plenty of hanging space great ventilation and suitable toiletries. However the shower over bath is only 750 mm wide or less and is uncomfortable to shower in. The hotel pool and spa are nice. Cleanliness helpful and pleasant staff. Comfortable bed and lounge. Decent kitchenette. Space to move. Local cafes across the road. Adjacent to Chatswod station. Try the Roti at the very busy Malaysian café outside the train station. Large bathroom has a terrible narrow shower over bath 750 mm. Room is big enough for a better design. A brewed coffee maker would be appreciated.
Kid loved the heated pool. Great location close to Sydney and will stay next time we are down.

Comfort in a good location. This is a very reasonable hotel close to lots of amenities and near the train station only a few stops to the city. Reasonably comfortable bed good air con heater 24 hr reception so I could check in late. Nice pool area with spa. different types of rooms available Studio 1 bdrm or 2 bdrm so good for families.

Friendly. The staff were always helpful. The room was neat and the bed and pillows very comfortable. The swimming pool was also enjoyable. Overall the location was perfect for my purposes whilst I was in Sydney.

Quality not up to par. For the money charged for the studio room i was highly disappointed by the lack of cleanliness of the room to the amenities that seemed to not work properly. To be honest as it was a 2nt stay i could nt be bothered making a fuss and letting staff know so just put up with it for the time i was there. I was more interested in being out of the hotel than in anyway. But definitely would not have been able to put up with things if i had been there longer than 2 days. From the bathroom faucet pipe noises that seemed to churn out the water in massive spurts and make loud noises to being woken up on a sunday early morning with staff fixing something in the room next door to having the balcony locked up due to compost in huge bags being stored to dust on the furnishings it was definitely not up to standard. I was on level 1 near the pool gym. Disappointing experience within the hotel but the location right near the heart of Chatswod is worth the hassle if only for a couple of days.

Had an exceptional experience. My hubby and I stayed at the hotel for the weekend and we were pleasantly surprised. After reading a couple of negative reviews we did not have high expectations but it was an excellent hotel at a very reasonable price. It was clean comfortable spacious and had more than we needed. The breakfast was excellent and the pool and spa was nice. The service was outstanding and friendly we even received a complimentary later checkout. We will definitely recommend them and be back ourselves.

Fantastic for a stay with kids. Great location pleasant rooms and very clean although bathroom dated. Difficulty showering. Having to climb into a bath when you are old is a challenge. Kitchen was roomy and well fitted for self catering with full sized appliances. Otherwise absolutely perfect for a stay. Grandchildren LOVED the pool.

DO NOT RECOMMEND. Flat pillows pool out of service for maintenance without prior notice still had to pay full price. No free wifi. No DVD player. Not worth the price. I have received better facilities at a 3 star motel.

Our Sydney Hone. We so missed having the pool to use. This is the second time we have stayed now and no pool. Third time lucky. But apart from that a great place to stay in Sydney. Relaxing homely clean central to everything we need.

Our Sydney Hone. We so missed having the pool to use. This is the second time we have stayed now and no pool. Third time lucky. But apart from that a great place to stay in Sydney. Relaxing homely clean central to everything we need.
Disgusting carpets. did not feel like we could walk around barefoot. Pool spa and sauna are closed. Staff are polite and helpful but the place feels tired and smells like an old motel.

Not great for long one month stay. Room was opposite to rubbish chut which has nt been managed properly great access to public transport shopping etc. needs a bit of renovation suitable for short stay business trips good swimming pool.
Good. Staff good. Shower splashed water out across the floor and pooled.

Dangerous to go to the pool at mantra chatswod. This was the second time I was there. I went to the pool with my young childhowever the pool was closed. The pool closed sign was very poorly placed on the door and it was hard to recognise. There was a chance for electric shock there. In such situation management should care about the people. It took too long to get the problem fixed.

Short getaway. Mantra Chatswod is in an awesome location right near the train station which we used a lot. Also great shops and restaurants all around although the restaurant attached to the mantra is not the best quite disappointed when we ate there overpriced and quality not that great. The 1 bedroom apartment we had was roomy plenty of room for 3 of us great size bathroom and included washer dryer is great. Kitchen is good too but what is the point of having an oven when there is no oven trays to use in the oven. We had to buy some cheap alfoil trays. To have to pay for wifi in 2017 is crazy for the price we paid to stay there it definitely should have been included also complimentary bottles of water is a standard regular these days in hotels we have travelled to many places both in Australia and overseas and water is always complimentary not up to 6 per bottle. The pool and spa area is great however the spa could actually be a few degrees warmer especially in the middle of winter it was too cold. The staff we encountered were all friendly and helpful could not fault them especially Nicole a lovely young lady could not have been more helpful.

Moderate price but a little tired. Looking for a relatively cheap place to stay a few days in Sydney this location is good but you should expect what you pay for. My studio was spacious enough but definitely needs to be adapted to modern standards. No power outlet available next to the bed vintage bathroom but functionally ok. The great disappointment was about the swimming pool whirlpool full of chemical foam as soon as turned on and a lot of dirt in the main pool. Despite the number of apartments it seems nobody dared to bath there.

I needed a night away to rest and recover from business of life. I loved my stay at the Mantra. Location close to lots of good restaurants Nice corner room with lots of natural light. TV remote did not work in the bedroom. The pool looked nice but was very enclosed When ever I went down there it was busy and stuffy.

Staff were accommodating and very polite. I specifically booked this hotel so I could use the spa and pool. I asked on arrival about the pool times. When I went to use the pool and spa there was a paper note on the door saying Sorry the pool and spa have no heating. So therefore not a spa. Why did n’t réception know. And especially why not working. Not happy.

Good Location. Room was good was facing street on 4th Level lot of street noise and train noise Otherwise presented welNo towels supplied for pool or spa have to use towels in romotherwise good place to stayVery close to trains and buses.

Would n’t stay again but appreciate pool and staff. The hotel corridors smelled like stale asian food beds comfy but outside noise unbearable. Good kitchen facilities and clean. Pool awesome staff friendly kitchen facilities great beds comfy great location.

Clean comfortable and convenient location. Clean and comfortable room. Access to small gym pool sauna and spa are incentives. Convenient location close to train station and shops restaurants. Payment of 100 bond at check. in is a bit steep. I think this regulation should be abolished or at least customers should be informed about this when booking.

Good 45 hotel. Great hotel excellent value for money lovely 1bed apartment and I loved the lap pool for a swim very clean and good temperature for water. Reception were very friendly and helpful thank you again.

motel is very run down. The room was very run down there were no curtains on one of the main lounge room windows the window was covered by a large piece of plastic from the outside. The lounge chairs were extremely dirty and stained. I often had trouble with the keys not activating the doors had to try 4 or 5 times. When they did work door was very hard to open had to give it a very hard shove. Also found this with the pool gym doors. The spa was not working which was also disappointing and no towels supplied in the pool area. Overall very disappointing stay definitely wo nt be staying again.

Great hotel in a great location. The Mantra Chatswod is a great hotel in an ideal location for the North Shore. Great staff and the loyalty program is excellent. Restaurant bar on site with gym and pool and a terrific spa. Carpets are looking a little tired as are curtains etc but the beds are crisp and comfortable and the services available are terrific.

Very comfortable and great facilities. We were very impressed with the size of the rooms and we had all the facilities we needed. we all enjoyed the pool and gym as well. Breakfast was completely to our satisfaction. The location suited us completely as we needed to be near the train station. The staff were friendly and understanding. Thanks a lot for a great stay.
Excellent. Great location. Good pool and spa. Interior dated.
First day here so far not as anticipated. Booked this hotel because they had a spa and heated pool. Spa out of order pool not heated. Really disappointed.

Loved our stay about to try and rebok a room. Loved our upgrade. We are ACOR members and when we checked in they said as members and availability was there. we had been given an upgrade to an apartment. Was a great room. Renovations were happening dust and ladders etc in lobby but staff lovely and it did nt worry us. Loved the pool for some exercise too. we hope to return soon.

Great budget friendly option in Chatswod. Great spot close to train interchange shops bars and restaurants. Staff friendly room functional and modern large smart TV comfy king bed and has a gym and pool. If you need to be in Chatswod this is a great budget friendly option. The noise from what I think was the air conditioning unit for the building was like someone was showering or running a bath in the unit above. It never stopped for the 3 days and nights I was there. Avoid room 810 for the air con noise.

Great hotel located in central Chatswod. Staff were friendly and helpful. Large room with fully equipped kitchen. We had a one bedroom apartment which also had a sofa bed. Indoor pool spa and sauna. Pool could have been a bit warmer for a heated pool. Also a gym.
Good service and facilities. The service desk was very helpful and the pool was great. The apartment was very clean and spacious.
